data.meta_description: What is 585 area code, its location, time zone, zip code? How to get 585 local phone number to serve Rochester, NY & nearby cities? Is it scam? Find here.

585 Area Code

Trusted and loved by 5500+ companies worldwide

Where is area code 585?

The area code 585 is located in the city of Rochester. It also serves 8 surrounding countries in Western New York. It was created on November 15, 2001.

The 585 area code covers an area of about 4,500 sq miles with about 1.5 million of population. Some of the major cities and towns in this area code are Rochester, Batavia, Canandaigua, Geneseo, Albion, Medina, and Wellsville.

Monroe, Genesee, Ontario, Orleans, Wyoming, Allegany, Erie, Steuben, and Niagara are the counties covered by area code 585. Yates, Livingston, Wayne, and Cattaraugus are some of the neighboring counties. This area code is in the Eastern (GMT -05:00) time zone.

The main city in area code 585 is Rochester, the county seat of Monroe County the third-largest city in New York State. Rochester is renowned for its natural wonders including the Genesee River and the High Falls, as well as its history of innovation, culture, and education.

Country USA State New York Major City Batavia, Canandaigua, Geneseo, Albion, Medina, and Wellsville Time Zone Eastern Time Zone (ET) Telephone Number Format +1 (585) XXX – XXXX Zip Code 14604-14627

How does 585 area code work?

The North American Numbering Plan (NANP) designates specific geographic regions with unique area codes, known as Numbering Plan Areas (NPAs). When placing a call, callers are required to dial a 10-digit number, including the area code.

For instance, to reach the number 275-1234, one would dial 1-585-555-1234, where ‘1’ represents the country code for the USA. The ‘585’ area code directs calls to the appropriate region, while ‘275’ serves as an exchange code or central office code, routing the call to a specific carrier or service provider. The final ‘1234’ identifies the subscriber, whether it’s a business or an individual.

With KrispCall plans, you can obtain a local number featuring the 585 area code. These 585 prefix numbers offer enterprise-grade features such as number sharing, number porting, text messages (SMS), multimedia messages (MMS), and call blocking.

KrispCall’s basic plan starts at just $15/user/month, making it affordable even for a small business.
